job_tasks.phrase: ontwerp, ontwikkel, en implementeer geavanceerde voorspellende modellen en algoritmes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of designing, developing, and implementing predictive models and algorithms, which falls under the definition of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: werkt aan diverse uitdagingen zoals computer vision, regressie- en classificatieproblemen, optimalisatie en natural language processing (NLP).
job_tasks.justification: These are all specific areas and problem types within traditional machine learning (computer vision, regression, classification, NLP), aligning with the definition of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkel experimenten om de technische haalbaarheid van verschillende modellen aan te tonen en om ze onderling te vergelijken.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the research and experimentation phase of model development, including feasibility studies and model comparison, which is part of the model development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen' indicates the task of integrating AI solutions into existing systems or workflows, which aligns with software integration.

soft_skills.phrase: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI
deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement heavily emphasizes the development and implementation of traditional AI/ML models and algorithms, including predictive modeling, computer vision, regression, classification, and NLP. While there is a mention of integrating AI solutions into business processes (1.A.1), the core technical tasks are predominantly focused on model development (1.B.1). There is no mention of Generative AI specific tasks. Therefore, the role aligns best with an ML Specialist (Data Scientist) profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to traditional ML model development and experimentation. However, it lacks specific details on technologies used, and the integration aspect is only mentioned once. The absence of any Generative AI terms makes the distinction from GenAI roles clear, contributing to a high confidence score.
